method: Mix the tuna, breadcrumbs, eggs, mayonnaise, spring onions and garlic together in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Divide the mixture into 8 and shape into patties. Cover and place in the fridge for 10 minutes. Heat the oil in a large frying pan over a medium-high heat. Cook the burgers in batches for 2 minutes on each side, or until well browned and cooked through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 x 160g tins tuna in water, drained and flaked,  100g/3Â½oz fresh breadcrumbs,  2 free-range eggs,  4 tbsp mayonnaise ,  4 spring onions, finely chopped,  1 small garlic clove, finely chopped,  2 tsp vegetable oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
